name: OrderApi_Get
description: Get a single order by its internal billbee id. This request is throttled to 6 calls per order in one minute

id.description: The internal billbee id of the order

articleTitleSource.description: The source field for the article title. 0 = Order Position (default), 1 = Article Title, 2 = Article Invoice Text

$ul: **Data**: A class that represents the Billbee data model of a single order
**AcceptLossOfReturnRight**: Customer accepts loss due to withdrawal
**ApiAccountId**: Id of the account, this order belongs to
**ApiAccountName**: The name of the account, this order belongs to. Will be ignored on order creation.
**ArchivedAt**: If set, the order was already archived at the given date. Further modification is disabled.
**BillBeeOrderId**: The Order.Id from the Billbee database
**BillBeeParentOrderId**: The Id of the parent order in the Billbee database
**BillbeeShopId**: The Billbee internal id of the shop connection
**BillbeeShopName**: The name of shop connection in Billbee
**Email**: The email address of this customer
**FirstName**: The first name of this customer
**FullName**: The full name ("firstname lastname") of this customer
**Id**: The Billbee internal id of this customer
**LastName**: The last name of this customer
**Nick**: The nick name (if available) from the original system
**Platform**: The name of the platform from which this customer originated
**Comments**: All messages / comments of the order
**ConfirmedAt**: The date on which the order was confirmed
**CreatedAt**: The date on which the order was created
**CustomInvoiceNote**: An optional multiline text which is printed on the invoice
**ArchivedAt**: If set, the customer was already archived at the given date. Further modification is disabled.
**Id**: The Billbee Id of the customer
**RestoredAt**: If set, the customer was restored from the archive at the given date.
**VatId**: The vat-id, that should be saved at the customer. Only used if CustomerVatId is not set on the order.
**CustomerNumber**: The customer number (not to be confused with the id of the customer)
**CustomerVatId**: The vat-id, that was given by the customer to fulfill this order
**DeliverySourceCountryCode**: An optional Country ISO2 Code of the country where order is shipped from (FBA)
**DistributionCenter**: An optional code for the distribution center delivering this order
**Id**: Id of the order in the external system (marketplace)
**InvoiceDate**: The date on which the invoice was created
**InvoiceNumberPostfix**: The postfix of the invoice number
**InvoiceNumberPrefix**: The prefix of the invoice number
**IsCancelationFor**: An optional Order Id (externalid) for an order if this is a cancel order (shopify only at the moment)
**IsFromBillbeeApi**: Indicates whether the order was created through the Billbee-Api or not.
**LanguageCode**: The two-letter language code of the customer
**LastModifiedAt**: Date of the last update, the order got
**MerchantVatId**: The vat-id, that should be displayed on the invoice and other order documents
**OrderItems**: The list of items purchased like shirt, pant, toys etc
**OrderNumber**: Order number of the order in the external system (marketplace)
**PayedAt**: The date on which the order was paid
**PaymentInstruction**: A textfield optionaly filled with a payment instruction text for printout on the invoice (z.B. Ebay Kauf auf Rechnung)
**PaymentReference**: A payment reference. Should not be used any more. Please use 'Payments' instead.
**PaymentTransactionId**: The id of the payment transaction. For example the transaction id of PayPal payment. Should not be used any more. Please use 'Payments' instead.
**RestoredAt**: If set, the order was restored from the archive at the given date.
**BillbeeShopId**: The Billbee internal id of the shop connection
**BillbeeShopName**: The name of shop connection in Billbee
**Email**: The email address of this customer
**FirstName**: The first name of this customer
**FullName**: The full name ("firstname lastname") of this customer
**Id**: The Billbee internal id of this customer
**LastName**: The last name of this customer
**Nick**: The nick name (if available) from the original system
**Platform**: The name of the platform from which this customer originated
**ShipWeightKg**: The total weight of the shipment(s)
**ShippedAt**: The date on which the order was shipped
**ShippingProfileId**: Internal Id for the shipping profile for that order
**ShippingProfileName**: Display Name of Shipping profile, if available
**ShippingProviderId**: Internal Id for the used shipping provider
**ShippingProviderName**: The Name for of used shipping provider
**ShippingProviderProductId**: Internal Id for the used shipping product
**ShippingProviderProductName**: The Name of the used shipping product
**State**: The current state of the order
**TotalCost**: The total cost excluding shipping cost
**UpdatedAt**: The date on which the order was last updated
**VatMode**: The vat mode of the order
